activities: Our customers are increasingly requesting us to editorially process and publish their proprietary documents embedded in our document databases.  Typically these documents are templates, completed forms, checklists, best practices and guidelines.  These documents may contain personal information; however, such information should not include sensitive personal information.  Thomson Reuters needs to host Aranzadi documents in the US because its data center in Spain has been closed.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer/organization data is electronically processed (not manually).
recoursemech:
Agencia Española de Protección de Datos (AEPD)
